solution_line_template: Joyce's new land is {multiplier} times larger than her old {previous_property_acres}-acre property, for a total of {previous_property_acres}*{multiplier}=<<{multiplier}*{previous_property_acres}={new_total_acres}>>{new_total_acres} acres of land.
One acre is not suitable for farming, leaving her with {new_total_acres}-{pond_acres}=<<{new_total_acres}-{pond_acres}={suitable_acres}>>{suitable_acres} acres of land suitable for farming.
